text: AKM Jahangir Hossain (1954 - 24 December 2020) was a Bangladeshi Bangladesh Awami League politician. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 1991 to 1995, 1996 to 2006 and from 2014 to 2018. From 1998 to 2001, he was Minister of Textiles and Jute. Hossain died on 24 December 2020 at a Dhaka hospital from COVID-19 at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Indonesia Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: AKM Jahangir Hossain
